tuck in.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to make a child comfortable in bed by arranging the sheets around them
tuck in.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to move a part of your body inwards so that it does not stick out so much
tuck in.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Stand up straight and tuck in your tummy.
tuck in.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: The ice creams came and we tucked in.
They tucked into a hearty breakfast of eggs.
